title: Marc Almond, Vermin in Ermine
description: Thanks for A Virgins Tale Vol 2. As per your request! Heres Vermin in Ermine. I dont feel bad sharing & spreading Marcs genius. I have paid at least a few grand (and assume Marc received his due royalties long long ago) Sadlly, my crated entire vinyl treasure trove was sold off by my loser EX. Since Ms accident Ive been sloowly rebuilding/rediscovering everything Marc & amazed how great the old Mambas stuff holds up! What a great male chanteuse hes become! Unfortunately the US cant seem to get past the TL days & recognize him for the great artist he is. Best RS links & albums are on the russian sites & all foreign non englsh music blogs. People who love Marc really really love him! Baby Gutter Heart sine I was like 12! Also, I put in the T-Total Bab\\\&#039;s on Fire ft Marc Almond track as well
